short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A TODO list for multiple projects with powerful search and tag support

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This project offers an offline to-do list with search and tag support. The user can use the built-in search engine of the extension to find the submitted issues.

Features:
Works offline
Supports multiple projects
Search among all projects
Has Gmail-liked tagging buttons: "Mark as Read", "Mark as Flagged", and "Mark as Pinned" 
Supports user-defined tags

Privacy Policy:
This extension does not send anything to any server whatsoever. It works locally and stores notes locally.
